br.br:
The mission of Louisa County Public Schools is to be a world-class, forward-thinking school division, one that is the model for school divisions of the future, and one where every student is challenged to reach his or her maximum potential.
Vision Statement
TeamLCPS will provide students with experiences to demonstrate the knowledge and skills to reach their fullest potential by communicating effectively, thinking critically, collaborating, being creative, and becoming positive and contributing global citizens.
